meanings.sent1: The colickiest baby in the nursery cried all night.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the colickiest child in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The colickiest kitten in the litter kept everyone awake with its constant meowing.
meanings.sent4: The storm was the colickiest one we had ever experienced, with thunder shaking the windows.
meanings.sent5: The colickiest horse in the stable would kick and whinny whenever someone approached.

meanings.sent1: The colickiest foal needed special care to prevent colic episodes.
meanings.sent2: The colickiest cows on the farm were closely monitored for any signs of discomfort.
meanings.sent3: The colickiest puppy in the litter always seemed to have a tummy ache.
meanings.sent4: The old car was the colickiest of the fleet, breaking down frequently.
meanings.sent5: The colickiest plants in the garden wilted easily in the hot sun.

meanings.definition: colickiest: having the most severe colic symptoms
meanings.sent1: The colickiest patients at the clinic required constant attention from the nurses.
meanings.sent2: The colickiest horses in the stable would thrash about in pain.
meanings.sent3: The colickiest squirrel in the park was spotted curled up in discomfort.
meanings.sent4: The colickiest engine in the factory would sputter and stall unpredictably.
meanings.sent5: The colickiest river in the region flooded every year during the rainy season.
